1.title: Open Your Eyes... DNA Surprise!
1.plot: In the Season 5 premiere, long-held feelings of anger and betrayal come to a head, after a family receive the results of DNA tests.

2.title: Stop Your Deadbeat Ways Before I Walk Away!
2.plot: Guests confront their parents with claims that they were neglected and abandoned as children.

3.title: I Declare... Family Warfare!
3.plot: Bill tries to help feuding family members find a way to forgive one another, as they share their hurt and betrayal over pains of the past.

4.title: You're a Low Down Deadbeat Dad!
4.plot: The topic is deadbeat dads. Included: a child's paternity is questioned; and a man confronts his ex's new boyfriend.

5.title: Twisted Sisters Fight Back!
5.plot: Women confront siblings, who they feel have hurt and betrayed them in the past.

6.title: Singled Out: The Unwanted Child
6.plot: Children abandoned by their mothers confront them and demand answers as to why they were deserted, but their siblings weren't.

7.title: Loving Sisters vs. Sketchy Misters
7.plot: Loved ones reveal shocking secrets, that threaten to ruin relationships, forever.

8.plot: Daughters accuse their daughters of neglecting and abandoning them.

9.title: Murder, Deception & DNA!
9.plot: Family members, who disapprove of the women their relatives are in relationships with, air their grievances.

10.title: Stop Partying and Start Parenting!
10.plot: Young mothers, who spend more time partying than parenting, are confronted by friends and family who fear they are in danger of losing their children.

11.title: Your Bro-mance Is Killing Our Romance!
11.plot: Women take on those whom they believe are bad influence on their men.

13.title: I Won't Rest Until You Take the DNA + LDT Tests!
13.plot: A woman accuses both her sister and her cousin of sleeping with her boyfriend; and a man takes a DNA test, hoping to prove that he isn't his supposed son's father.

14.title: Big Bad Baby Daddy Denies DNA

15.title: Meddling Moms Cross the Line
15.plot: A man accuses his mother-in-law of trying to destroy his marriage; and a mother and daughter face off over who's to blame for their volatile relationship.

16.title: Relationships on the Line... Results Just in Time!
16.plot: Accusations of betrayal are settled with a lie-detector test. Also: a couple in a nasty paternity battle.

17.title: Mama Knows Best or Is She Just Obsessed?

18.plot: Couples take lie-detector tests, in order to determine whether their relationships are worth saving.

20.plot: DNA testing is used to settle parentage disputes.
